title: New: EDDI LINES – GIGANTIC
content:
Contrary to popular belief, capitalizing your band name does not make the music brash nor abrasive, in fact it’s pretty much the opposite with New York songstress EDDI LINES.

A dwindling piano ballad, that’s as sleek and resplendent as possible without slipping to the overproduced Adele category, GIGANTIC has all the makings of a ‘blog-hit’. Ending on the poignant line ‘I’ll crawl out of this hole, soon enough, take my ring off’, it’s both devastating and enthralling all at once.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
